item.title: Slayer
item.dc:creator: @killer_2008 killer_2008
item.description:
@killer_2008 wrote:

Well since i deleted my other server files by mistake im making another one and im trying to add slayer again i have this codes still im not getting slay xp from the monsters any one know whats wrong? here r the codes that i have in npc handler

[code] public static boolean IsDropping = false;
public void MonsterDropItem(int NPCID)
{
{
if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2035) { //Spiders
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];
try{
ppl.addSkillXP(3000, 18);
} catch(Exception E) {
ppl.addSkillXP(3000, 18);
}
}

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1619) { //Bloodvelds
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];
try{
ppl.addSkillXP(2000, 18);
} catch(Exception E) {
ppl.addSkillXP(2000, 18);
}
}

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1615) { //Abyssal Demon
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];
try{
ppl.addSkillXP(2000, 18);
} catch(Exception E) {
ppl.addSkillXP(2000, 18);
}
}

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 49) { //Hellbounds
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];
try{
ppl.addSkillXP(7000, 18);
} catch(Exception E) {
ppl.addSkillXP(7000, 18);
}
}

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1625) { //Smoke Devil
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];
try{
ppl.addSkillXP(2000, 18);
} catch(Exception E) {
ppl.addSkillXP(2000, 18);
}
}

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1655) { //crawling hand
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];
try{
ppl.addSkillXP(1000, 18);
} catch(Exception E) {
ppl.addSkillXP(1000, 18);
}
}[/code]
